content: s shape well sew the nose at the top part of the snout over rounds 1-3 using the left-over tail to sew on a little mouth under the nose before weaving in your end now you will begin the decrease rounds 20 decrease scx6 around 42 21 single_crochet around 42 22 decrease scx5 around 36 23 single_crochet around 36 24 decrease scx4 around 30 25 decrease scx3 around 24 26 decrease scx2 around 18 stuff most of head here 27 decrease single_crochet around 12 28 decrease around 6 fo finish stuffing head close hole with tail & weave in end ears make 2 -
